metadata.dc:description: A case of pharyngeal tuberculosis secondary to pulmonary tuberculosis is reported. The importance of biopsy for the histopathological and microbiological diagnosis is emphasized.
metadata.dc:title: Tuberculosis faríngea. Caso clínico.
[Pharyngeal tuberculosis: a clinical case].
